meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed tetracycline to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: She took tetracycline to help her body fight off the bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the tetracycline army marching in.
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed the tetracycline soldiers to battle the germs.
meanings.sent5: The tetracycline capsules were like tiny warriors fighting the bacterial invaders.

meanings.definition: A yellow crystalline powder used in medicine.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist measured out the tetracycline for the prescription.
meanings.sent2: The yellow tetracycline powder was carefully mixed into the solution.
meanings.sent3: The tetracycline powder shimmered like golden dust in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The medicine tasted like tetracycline sunshine in a spoon.
meanings.sent5: The tetracycline crystals sparkled like tiny grains of sunlight in the bottle.
